title: Laura Milnor Iverson Rainbow Buddha Chakra Meditation Handmade Jewelry
features: Wear a piece of fine art!
Archival print topped with a glass cabochon. Pendant size: 1 1/4" or 30mm (not including the bail, which is the loop that fits over the necklace).
A black ribbon necklace is included so the piece is ready to wear. These have an extender chain that adjusts from approximately 16 1/2" - 18", closing with a lobster claw clasp.
Ships in an organza drawstring bag with a signed Certificate of Authenticity
Handmade in the artist's Pacific Northwest studio
description: "Opening the Chakras Meditation" Buddha, sitting in meditation beneath a tree, contemplates a hillside transformed into the chakra spectrum of the rainbow. The tree was inspired by one of my favorite bay trees at Rancho San Antonio Open Space Preserve in Mountain View, California. Offered as a handcrafted pendant from artwork by California Artist Laura Milnor Iverson. Pendant size: 1 1/4" or 30mm (not including the bail, which is the loop that fits over the necklace). Material: Archival print topped with a glass cabochon. For the setting, silver plating on zinc alloy (lead free). There are two styles of necklaces available: a feminine black ribbon necklace (with a 2" extender chain for a length of 16 1/2" - 18") that closes with a lobster claw clasp, and a 24" ball chain for larger sizes (great unisex option). Please verify that you have selected the correct option when placing your order. This wearable art is not waterproof.
details: {"Item model number": "chakra1circle", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "September 19, 2013", "Manufacturer": "Laura Milnor Iverson"}
